mutants.code:
import pandas as pd

def get_school_year_extremes(df: pd.DataFrame) -> pd.DataFrame:
    df = df.sort_index()
    first_days = df.head(5)
    last_days = df.tail(4)
    result = pd.concat([first_days, last_days])
    return result

import pandas as pd

def get_school_year_extremes(df: pd.DataFrame) -> pd.DataFrame:
    df = df.sort_index()
    first_days = df.head(4)
    last_days = df.tail(-4)
    result = pd.concat([first_days, last_days])
    return result
